text:
Select the option that most accurately completes the sentence below. If you choose "something else," you will be given an opportunity to explain. My experience with
Working effectively and appropriately with various media
in acaemic writing (i.e., for school) comes from...
hover: e.g., researching and composing in appropriate modes, such as alphabetic, visual, audio

followups.text: What do you mean by "something else?"
